root.name: Sacrilegium
root.description: OverviewSacrilegium is a survival horror game from Reality Pump. It is built on their own GRACE 2 (Graphics Rendition And Creation Engine) engine, which is an evolution of the engine used in Two Worlds II.The game stars Alex, a 20 year old college student from California. She is on an adventure with her friends have to survive the bizarre and dangerous world of Sacrilegium which will take her all around the globe from San Francisco to forgotten places in Europe.
